SBS.CO.summary: Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S, together with its subsidiaries, provides automotive and friction parts for the automotive aftermarket in Europe and internationally. The company's SBS Automotive segments sources, completes, and distributes brake and wear parts, including mechanical and hydraulic brake parts; steering parts and wheel bearing kits; suspension and transmission parts; clutch parts; and starters and alternators primarily under the NK brand or as private labels. It also operates sales and distribution platforms. In addition, this segment distributes its products directly to distributors, including international groups, capital chains, purchasing groups, and independent distributors. Its SBS Friction segments develops, manufactures, and sells brake parts and friction technology for motorcycles, scooters, and other ATV/UTV vehicles, as well as for various specialized areas that apply friction technology, including wind turbines. This segment primarily offers brake pads, brake discs, brake shoes, and accessory parts. The company was formerly known as OBTEC and changed its name to Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S in 2003. Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S was founded in 1964 and is based in Svendborg, Denmark. Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S is a subsidiary of Stiholt Holding A/S.
